Page_Metadata.prompt: Extract key meta information including page title, description, keywords, Open Graph, Twitter Card tags, canonical URL, and viewport settings.
Page_Metadata.label: Page Metadata

Site_Optimization.prompt: Evaluate internal and external links, robots meta tags, hreflang attributes, SEO-friendly URLs, and mobile optimization. Include checks for minified resources and page load speed.
Site_Optimization.label: Site Optimization and SEO Elements

Structured_Data.prompt: Extract structured data including JSON-LD, schema.org markup, product data, backlinks, page rank/SEO score, and any broken links.
Structured_Data.label: Structured Data and Schema

Content_Tags.prompt: Retrieve accessibility information like image alt text, favicon, AMP version, and relevant social sharing tags.
Content_Tags.label: Content and Social Tags

Legal_And_Sitemap.prompt: Identify and extract XML sitemap link, robots.txt content, and legal pages (privacy policy, terms of service, disclaimers).
Legal_And_Sitemap.label: Legal and Sitemap
